tableSchema.table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `USER` ( `ID` INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `USER_NAME` VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, `USER_IDENTITY` VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, `USER_PASSWORD` VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `KEY_STORE` ( `ID` INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `USER_ID` INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `KEY_TYPE` VARCHAR(32) DEFAULT NULL, `REQUIRED_DATE` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), `KEY_VALUE` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) );
